Headline: Harlem-bound Green, Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green & Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green & Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Experiencing Delays Boarding Change
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains have been rrtd via in the Inner Loop track. Please board Brown Line trains on the Orange Line side of the stations on the Loop "L".

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains have been rerouted via in the Inner Loop track due to a mechanical problem on a train. Please board Brown Line trains on the Orange Line side of the stations on the Loop "L". 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
